title: 2 Bedroom on Chauncy St. Walk to Harvard Sq.
posting_body: Apartment on Third floor of a Charming older building, very close to Harvard and Porter Square and just steps from Harvard Law School and Lesley College.
This apartment features High ceilings, Hardwood floors, galley kitchen, large bedrooms, and spacious living room.
Heat and hot water are included with the rent.
Parking is on street with city permit.
It also features tremendous, closet space, Live in Superintendent and laundry room in basement.
First, last month's rent and broker fee due with lease.
